title: 你們覺得哪一首minecraft歌曲最好聽?
author: qwer3456
txt_content:
本帖最后由 qwer3456 于 2013-8-10 15:34 编辑 

我個人是覺得glowstone love是我的最愛。
各位大大或小弟，你們覺得呢?

replies.author: stalincenlam
replies.txt_content: 游戏唱片。。。黑色那个，好像叫stal，是爵士乐

replies.author: middo
replies.txt_content: 碎碟子……保证好听塞

replies.author: Coerce
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content: cat

replies.author: 丿倾世灬辉少丶
replies.txt_content: Dj got  us fallin in love 这首歌不错{:10_523:}

replies.author: YSM123
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕之声 Hissin Vaecon
复仇（DJ got us fallin love)和失落的王国(viva la vida)最好听了。

replies.author: phoenixlzx
replies.txt_content: cat 和 stal 不错。其实我很稀饭游戏内背景音乐，resource里那三首calm 我都很稀饭～

replies.author: 甜甜小雪
replies.txt_content: 潜行吧 苦力怕

replies.author: cp55
replies.txt_content: 最近新出的章鱼哥唱k{:10_525:}

replies.txt_content: 呃，還以為你說遊戲里的唱片的說...
我觉得这首不错
